name: You got one (Sling-)Shot
description:
Welcome to my small game for the Trijam #201, with the theme "You got 1 shot".

This is my first game jam and also my first published game. Due to that, I was not able to achieve everything I wanted to do (e.g. there are no sound effects :(), and it also took me longer than the expected 3h. 
But it was a great learning experience, and I hope it is fun to play as well.

Enjoy :)

PS: Unfortunately I got some issues with the resolution for the WebGL here in itch.io (again, first published project), so it looks not perfect. Use full screen for better experience.

Assets used:

  • Graphics: https://craftpix.net/product/top-down-2d-game-kit/
  • Music: https://motionarray.com/royalty-free-music/jump-on-me-1248948/
